short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a timer, word checker, and random word generator to Infinite Craft

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds stopwatch functions to the Infinite Craft web app. The stopwatch lets you start, stop, and reset a timer. The extension also adds word matching. That way you can type out a word to search for and once the word is found in the game the stopwatch timer will automatically stop.

Users who like to set a goal in Infinite Craft, speed running, or want to race their friends to find a word should use this app to help track their progress.

NOTE: You must type in a word and press ENTER to add it to the list. The list will populate the left side of the play area.
